predicate.note: Frames file for 'impel' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

role.descr: impelled agent, if extracted from action

example.name: no causal agent
example.text: She concedes that such a position is ``unfair'' to the thousands of conscientious and qualified people plying the trade, but as a consumer advocate she feels impelled [*-1] to take it.

example.name: all args
example.text: Mary's threats of bodily harm impelled John to clean his room.
